text: Marc Houalla (born 10 February 1961 at Rueil-Malmaison) Marc Houalla le pilote du changement is a French aerospace engineer. From the 28th of November 2008 Décret du 27 novembre 2008 portant nomination du directeur de l'École nationale de l'aviation civile - M. Houalla (Marc) to October 2017, he is the head of the French Civil Aviation University. Marc Houalla, directeur de l'ENAC (École nationale de l'aviation civile) Graduate from the ENAC (IÉNAC L82) and having a MBA from HEC Paris (1990), he has done different jobs in air transport such as director of SEFA Marc Houalla before being joining the French Civil Aviation University.
